import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const AddToCartPage = ({product}) => { return ( <>
{product.title}
{product.description}
₹{((product.price) * 81).toLocaleString()}.00
⭐{product.rating}

buy this
save for review
) } export default AddToCartPage
